snippet.title: Quiet as a Stone - Trailer
snippet.description: http://www.quietasastone.com Throw Rocks Plant Trees. Remake the world in this minimalistic slow game for casual creators. Discover a long lost history. Create your own scenes. Explore atmospheric countryside vignettes. Sit by Campfires. Relaxing soundscapes with satisfying interactions. Photography mode. Embrace impermanence.
